function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exacerbation of existing health care inequalities among minority groups due to the pandemic","Impact":"Worsening health outcomes for marginalized communities, increasing the burden on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Investing in targeted healthcare resources and infrastructure for vulnerable communities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, and telehealth systems","People":"Marginalized communities, especially indigenous peoples","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Compounding environmental injustices due to Covid-19 impact on vulnerable populations","Impact":"Increased risk of preexisting conditions, higher susceptibility to Covid-19, and worsening health disparities","Mitigation":"Improving environmental and air quality standards in minority communities, reducing exposure to harmful pollutants","Technologies":"Air purification systems, environmental monitoring devices","People":"Minority groups at heightened risk of preexisting conditions","Owner":"Environmental agencies, government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Usurpation of regulatory processes by powerful incumbent interests during the pandemic","Impact":"Policies favoring narrow interests over public good, increased environmental degradation, and exploitation of resources","Mitigation":"Strengthening oversight and transparency in regulatory processes, reducing influence of vested interests","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent record-keeping, AI for monitoring and detecting regulatory manipulation","People":"General public, environmental advocates, regulatory bodies","Owner":"Government, regulatory agencies"}]}
